dcterms:creator: Elena Alvarez-Mellado
dcterms:description: A corpus of Spanish newspaper headlines annotated for Anglicisms, providing insights into the usage of English words in Spanish media.

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for natural language inference tasks, derived from code-mixed conversations, facilitating the study of multilingual interactions.
dcterms:title: A New Dataset for Natural Language Inference from Code-mixed Conversations

dcterms:creator: Waﬁa Adouane
Jean-Philippe Bernardy
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of low-resource noisy code-switched user-generated texts from Algeria, aimed at exploring multi-task learning benefits.
dcterms:title: Algerian Texts (Low-Resource Noisy Code-switched User-generated)

dcterms:creator: Arra’Di Nur Rizal
Sara Stymne
dcterms:description: Synthetic data created for evaluating word embeddings specifically for Indonesian-English code-mixed text, enhancing NLP model training.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data for Evaluating Word Embeddings for Indonesian–English Code-Mixed Text

dcterms:creator: Pranaydeep Singh
Els Lefever
dcterms:description: A dataset of tweets in Hinglish (Hindi-English code-mixed) used for sentiment analysis, employing cross-lingual word embeddings.
dcterms:title: Hinglish Code-mixed Tweets

Febe De Wet

dcterms:description: A dataset for English-isiZulu code-switched speech recognition, focusing on semi-supervised training of acoustic and language models.
